credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Do Women Have to be Naked to Get into the Met. Museum?
description: At left, nude woman (modeled after Igres' "Odalisque"), reclining on red surface with back to viewer, wearing a gorilla mask and holding a fan in right hand. Text at right, in black, reads: Do women have to be naked to get into the Met. Museum? Below, additional text in black and red reads: Less than 5% of the artists in the Modern/ Art sections are women, but 85%/ of the nudes are female./ Guerrilla Girls Conscience of the Art World/ www.guerrillagirls.com
name: Poster
